title: The Writer's Almanac - Saturday, March 20, 2021
description: “It’s a Beautiful Day in the Neighborhood, a beautiful day for a neighbor. Would you be mine? Could you be mine?” Written by Fred Rogers who was born this day in 1928.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
